title: Fundamentals of Engineering Thermodynamics 7th c2011 Moran txtbk
description:
Fundamentals of Engineering Thermodynamics, 7th Edition (c2011), textbook by Michael J. Moran, Howard N. Shapiro, Daisie D. Boettner & Margaret B. Bailey.

TEXTBOOK INFO: Google these 2 keywords together: Wiley productCd-EHEP001818
(ISBN-13: 9780470495902)
(current edition: 8th c2015 - just out)

CONTENTS:
---------
1. Getting Started: Introductory Concepts and Definitions
2. Energy and the First Law of Thermodynamics
3. Evaluating Properties
4. Control Volume Analysis Using Energy
5. The Second Law of Thermodynamics
6. Using Entropy
7. Exergy Analysis
8. Vapor Power Systems
9. Gas Power Systems
10. Refrigeration and Heat Pump Systems
11. Thermodynamic Relations
12. Ideal Gas Mixture and Psychrometric Applications
13. Reacting Mixtures and Combustion
14. Chemical and Phase Equilibrium
APPENDICES: Tables, Figures, and Charts
(detailed contents at website above)

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF (32 MB).
compressed (zipped): *right-click* the filename (.7z) & choose *Extract* to convert to PDF; discard the .7z file (container) when done with seeding.

COMMENT: Solutions manuals for the 6th (200 MB) and 5th (70 MB) editions, available here, will sure be helpful given that usually a large portion of the problems are recycled from previous editions.
